trans-unit.target: Adja meg az adatait a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.DataError"> </xref> esemény.

trans-unit.source: The BindingManagerDataErrorEventArgs provides the <xref:System.Exception> that was caught in the binding process.
trans-unit.target: A BindingManagerDataErrorEventArgs biztosít a <xref:System.Exception>, amely a kötés során talált.</xref:System.Exception>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerDataErrorEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Egy új példányát inicializálja a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerDataErrorEventArgs"> </xref> osztály.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception> that occurred in the binding process that caused the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.DataError"></xref> event to be raised.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Exception>, amely a kötés során, ami miatt történt a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.DataError"> </xref> eseményre.</xref:System.Exception>

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref:System.Exception> caught in the binding process that caused the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.DataError"></xref> event to be raised.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi a <xref:System.Exception>lépett fel a kötés során, ami miatt a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.DataError"> </xref> eseményre.</xref:System.Exception>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception> that caused the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.DataError"></xref> event to be raised.
